column3: hm right, seems that I did some duplicated effort :-)\n

Your Erase naming is more consistent with the name of other functions.
SetDefaultAddress was missing.
Also, I agree that code should be extracted from .h to .cpp files!

It's nice to see some activity, and thanks for the (indirect) feedback! :-)
If this is still relevant with the new QT GUI, please rebase and re-open.\n
For the record, this fix got merged for 0.3.24.\n
